message.new_merge_commit: The Merge Request '{mrTitle}' received a new commit. Please review the changes.

hints.apiToken: Private API token (needs the read-api permissions)

alerts.invalid-credentials: Not able to connect to the gitlab server using this combination of host and api-token

body.description: This browser extension is a tool to receive GitLab notifications on your operating system. It was created out of the need to handle review requests more quickly and efficiently within the team.
body.legals: This browser extension is not developed, supported, or maintained by GitLab Inc. It is an independent project that is not affiliated with GitLab.
body.license: The browser extension is licensed under the GNU General Public License Version 3 (GPL-3). For more information on the license and terms, please refer to the LICENSE file in the project.
